ADMIN_IDS.description: IDs of Discord users who should be able to control your Bot with commands, separated by a comma.

JWT_SIGNATURE_KEY.description: A long random string which will be used for encryption. Don't share with anyone and don't change once it's been set!

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Token of your Discord Bot (created via https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/)

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: ID of the channel where status update messages should be sent to.

LOG_SERVER_ID.description: ID of the server where status update messages should be sent to.
